title: Fabulous 1100 sq ft 2 bed, 2 bath in sought-after Northville area
posting_body: ['Park Place Northville', '43001 Northville Place Dr', 'Northville, MI 48167', 'A wonderful home in Northville is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 2 bedroom 2 bathroom renting for $1655 - $2036 per month.', 'This unit comes with 1100 sq ft.', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Welcome to Park Place of Northville, located in Northville, Michigan.', 'Start making your apartment dreams a reality when you lease one of our luxury apartments near Farmington Hills.', 'Residents can select their perfect rental from a variety of one and two bedroom apartment floor plans.', 'Our community offers apartments featuring stainless steel appliances, large picture windows, walk-in closets and more!', 'Check the availability on our floor plans and apply for your new home today.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '➢ 24 Hour Fitness Gym', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Online Payments Available', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ Swimming Pool', '➢ Tennis Court', '➢ Volleyball Court', '➢ Wifi-Cafe', '➢ Center Sidewalks Throughout', '➢ Close to Downtown Northville', '➢ Concierge', '➢ House Plant Watering Service', '➢ Lush Landscaping', '➢ Luxury Building', '➢ Minutes from shopping, dining, and entertainment', '➢ Package Receiving', '➢ Pets Allowed', '➢ Smoke-Free', 'Unit Highlights:', '➢ Carport Spaces Assigned ($10 per month)', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Granite Upgrade (Premium Units Only)', '➢ Heating', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ In-Home Washer/Dryer', '➢ Lake Views (Select Units)', '➢ Private Balcony or Patio', '➢ Private Entrances (Select Units)', '➢ Spacious Master Bedroom', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Leasing Options:', '4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We are extremely pet-friendly, however, dogs are only allowed in Buildings 1 through 10!', 'Also, we even have "While Away" pet care!', 'Pet rent is $30 per pet.', 'Management:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '16F90294B5AF4C52']
